content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">   <ShortName>CEH Wiki</ShortName>   <Description>Search CEH Wiki</Description>   <Tags></Tags>   <Contact>confluence-autosupportrequests@atlassian.com</Contact>   <Url type="text/html"        template="https://wiki.ceh.ac.ukdosearchsite.action?searchQuery.spaceKey=conf_global&searchQuery.queryString={searchTerms}"/>   <LongName>Welcome to the *CEH WIKI* using Confluence.  The enterprise wiki is designed to make it easy for you and your project/programme team to share information with each other, and with the world.    *Where do I start?*  All content in Confluence is organised into _spaces_ (see below). So to start browsing content, simply click on one of the spaces listed below.   Please Note that you may not have permissions to view all the spaces. </LongName>   <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/png"></Image>   <Query role="example" searchTerms="builder" />   <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>   <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding> </OpenSearchDescription>
